Saya memilih Oakwood residence cikarang sebagai tempat menginap saat saya ada pekerjaan di Cikarang. Dan ternyata pilihan saya sangat tepat. Saya stay selama 3 hari di Oakwood dan suasana kamar dan lingkungannya sangat nyaman. Berbeda sekali dengan beberapa hotel / apartemen lain yg pernah saya tinggali di Cikarang. Saya bisa katakan bahwa Oakwood ini adalah salah satu tempat yang terbaik untuk business stay atau staycation. Fasilitasnya sangat lengkap dan juga suasana hotelnya homey sekali.

Saya juga sangat mengapresiasi resepsionis dari Oakwood (Mba Tria) yang sangat responsif dalam menanggapi keluhan dari customer dan juga sangat informatif.

Terima kasih banyak mba Tria. 

Keep up the good work Oakwood  Residence Cikarang.

Will stay here again for sure if I have another assignment in Cikarang.
title: Pengalaman Business Stay Yang Sangat Berkesan

text:
Check in was so easy, friendly staff and always ready to help. We have room with city view. In the room, very complete stuff such as microwave, toaster, dispenser, 2 door fridge, stove and other useful household stuff.  The room was clean, have bathtub. Kids was really happy. It also have balcony, really amazing. 

The pool was good, have kids, babies and adult pool with view of park. Oakwood also have a beautiful park and kids playground. It has billiard and unexpected amazing library. I have been to many hotels and residences but there were no library I have ever met. 

It has good coffee shop and also sentosa restaurant, great seafood taste. It also has grocery store to help us with stuff we needs

Overall experience was really amazing and we are very happy to stay. And of course will be back. See you.
title: Excellent Residence to stay with family and with affordable price

text:
I have checked in Feb 22, and plan to stay here for 6 months for purpose of business. Overall it's homely, the staff especially is very kind and accomodative. The facilities provided in the residence are kitchen, cable tv , fully air conditioned. Bedroom equipped with wardrobe and queen sized bed. Working table and superb internet connection is a blessing. We have a good japanese hotel and a couple of cafes within the the property. Not to forget the live sea food market, that is what keeps calling me. Overall it gives a homely feeling. I would like to thank the hotel staff especially Mr. Mohd Kipni, who cleans my apartment most of the times. I would say, he does the job very well. 
There is a breakfast provided in the Holiday Inn as an additional service along with the booking. Some issues with quality of food they serve but for a vegetarian it's a no go most of times. You will have to survive on bread, toast , salad.
I think things could be better, by providing good kitchen equipments, especially the cooking utensils. For a vegetarian person , there is very few options or no options but to cook food in the apartment.
Lastly thanks to Lidwina Dinta, for being the most reached out person , and making my stay comfortable.

저희 Oakwood Residence Cikarang을 선택해 주시고 나아가 Trip Advisor에 후기까지 남겨주신 고객님께 깊은 감사드립니다. 저희 또한 고객님께서 레지던스에 머무르시는 동안 저희의 서비스와 더불어 객실 및 부대시설에 만족하셨다는 점을  매우 기쁘게 생각합니다.
 
고객님의 소중한 칭찬은 저희 임직원 모두가 공유하였으며 이는 항상 최고의 서비스를 제공하고자 하는 저희직원 모두에게 값진 동기부여가 될 것이라 믿어 의심치 않습니다.
 
향후에도 저희의 도움이 필요하신 경우 언제든지 말씀부탁드리며  고객님께 최고의 서비스로 다시 모시는 순간을 기대하겠습니다. 감사합니다.

Shafar Jamaludin  |  General Manager

text:
家族で住んでいますが、毎日ハウスキーピングを頼んでいます。
クオリティは人によりますが、女性スタッフ(Tika)はとても丁寧に掃除やタオル、シーツ交換をしてくれ、言わなくても飲水の交換をしてくれたり気配りができます。
担当者が変わったようなので、個人的にはまた女性スタッフ(Tika)に戻してほしいですが。

ホテルと併設しており、レストランや銀行、バーラウンジ、ルームサービスもあります。
日本人にとても住みやすくこのクオリティを維持して欲しいですね。
title: ハウスキーピングのクオリティ
